title: Wereturtle

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During a New Moon, Learn who visits you and your teammates
- During a Full Moon, Provide Basic Defense to one other player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have Detection Immunity, but only during non-Full Moon Nights.
- You have a night chat with other Weres
- Visit results are shared with other Weres.
- You cannot target other Weres

fields.name: Hunting Moon Enchancement:
fields.value:
**Strong Shell**
You will learn who visits your target, in addition to granting them Powerful defense. You may only target another Were.

desc:
Post 534
*Must be a snapping turtle that bit him.*
